Title: Stage
Writer: Palnati Surya Pratap (script coordinator), Chandrasekhar T. Ramesh (script supervisor), Srinivas Rongali (additional screenplay), Srinivas Rongali (dialogue), Buchi Babu Sana (additional screenplay), Buchi Babu Sana (dialogue), Thota Srinivas (dialogue), Sukumar (screenplay), Sukumar (story), Kasi Vishal (additional screenplay), Kasi Vishal (dialogue)
Actors: Ram Charan, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Aadhi, Jagapathi Babu
Plot: The fear of his elder brother's death starts to haunt an innocent, hearing impaired guy after they both join forces to overthrow the unlawful 30 year long regime of their village's president.
